Name: Olho
About the game: 'Olho' is a 2D platform game, defend your planet from invaders that aims to sell your planet. Each defeated boss releases a different new power. Although it may seem simple, 'Olho' is a challenging game, which requires quick reflexes and good coordination, Even if you don't have the game, you have 4 difficulties, extremely easy, easy, normal and difficult. If you like platform games, you can't miss 'Olho'. The action is intense and the game is addictive. Jump, shoot, attack with your tentacles, look for new eyes to improve your skills, face powerful enemies and unlock new abilities Note: Some controls must be mapped: follow the steps below and press F1 With the mouse, click on Settings in the upper left corner / Operation Settings Keyboard and mouse do not need to be mapped unless the player feels the need to. xbox controllers F1 --- Configure Controls W,A,S,D --- Directional --- Movement Enter --- Start --- Pause backspace --- Select --- Boss selection Q,E --- RT , LT --- Shortcut to switch skills 1 --- LB --- Skill Menu Shift --- B --- Dash I --- RB --- Load O --- X --- Tentacle P --- Y --- Trigger Space --- A --- Jump Evolve your powers Explore the map in search of monuments, Look for Eyes, emeralds and gems to improve and enable your skills. Fight powerful bosses
